name: Reverse Person Shooter
description:
REVERSE PERSON SHOOTER - PROTOTYPE BUILD V.1

Reverse Person Shooter is currently was in development, this is a prototype for gameplay and visual demonstration purposes, enjoy!

CONTROLS (MOUSE & KEYBOARD)

Shoot: Left mouse button
Reload: 'R' key
Mirror: Right mouse button
Crouch: 'C' key
Jump: 'Space' key
Pause: 'P' Key

CONTROLS (GAMEPAD)

Shoot: Right trigger
Reload: Left face button
Mirror: Left trigger
Crouch: Right face button
Jump: bottom face button
Pause: Start button
